lead_paragraph: An official said over 1,000 protesters had gathered outside a police station in Rupandehi, some throwing stones and firebombs, to demonstrate against a draft constitution.

headline.main: 4 Killed After Police Fire Rubber Bullets at Protesters in Nepal

snippet: An official said over 1,000 protesters had gathered outside a police station in Rupandehi, some throwing stones and firebombs, to demonstrate against a draft constitution.
